sourcesContent:
import * as Yup from 'yup';

export const registerSchema = Yup.object({
    username: Yup.string()
        .min(4, 'Minimum 4 characters')
        .max(25, 'Maximum 25 characters')
        .required(),
    email: Yup.string()
        .email('Invalid email')
        .required(),
    password: Yup.string()
        .required()
        .min(3, 'Minimum 3 characters')
        .max(10, 'Maximum 10 characters')
})
